
Changelog
=========

1.0.12 (2015-10-26)
-----------------------------------------

* Return nan in forbidden region instead of throwing exception


1.0.11 (2015-10-26)
-----------------------------------------

* Fix bug in subsolar/MLT conversion

-----------------------------------------

* No code changes, debugged automatic build/upload process and needed new version numbers along the way


1.0.0 (2015-10-07)
-----------------------------------------

* Initial release
